definitions: To write or carve (words or symbols) on something, especially as a formal or permanent record.
To draw (a figure) within another so that its boundaries touch the maximum number of points on the inner boundaries of the other.
To enter (a name or item) on a list or in a register.
examples: The monument was inscribed with the names of fallen soldiers.
A circle inscribed within a square.
His name was inscribed in the club's ledger.
